snippet: Traders are waiting on the European Central Bank’s policy meeting and the government’s employment report.
abstract: Stock market rises modestly as investors wait for European Central Bank's policy meeting and the government's employment report for May.
lead_paragraph: Traders are waiting on the European Central Bank’s policy meeting and the government’s employment report.

headline.main: Shares Rise as Investors Await News on Rates and Jobs
headline.print_headline: Shares Rise as Investors Await News on Rates and Jobs
